name: Smoll Bolls
description:
Some weeks ago I came across a tutorial by the wonderful and enthusiastic Raja Biswas on Udemy where he made a bouncing ball game in forty minutes flat. Knowing just enough about Unity to follow what he was doing, I watched transfixed as he did indeed, knock out a game in forty minutes.  As I watched, I imagined how I might make a similar game in Godot. 

It took me more than forty minutes I can tell you. But I had a lot of fun, added a few features and learnt a shedload along the way. So without further ado, here it is, in all it's erm.... glory? 

Click the bouncing balls to pop them. Listen to the funky tunes. Enjoy :c)
